name: Antisquare
description:
Antisquare is a game about inverting squares. You click on the arrows and they turn clock-wise until they can move forward, then move until they hit a wall. On their way, they invert all the squares they pass over. 

Your goal is to make all squares white.

GGJ Submission Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/antisquare-5
